pageProduct.name: Olay Moisturising Cream Sensitive Skin 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Moisturising Cream Sensitive Skin provides moisture nourishment for up to 12 hours. The moisturiser hydrates and repairs skin to give you timeless, beautiful skin for life.

Designed for Sensitive skin to provide moisture nourishment for up to 12 hours Discover Olay. Skincare that meets the needs of every woman. Olay has evolved from once iconic beauty fluid to an extensive skincare brand that delivers younger looking, beautiful skin. With multiple ranges to choose from, women can be assured their skincare routine is tailored to meet their individual wants, needs, aspirations and concerns- be it hydration, sun protection, or targeting ageing. Women are therefore able to challenge what's possible with their skin.

Suitable For: Sensitive Skin

Size: 100g

Fragrance Free?: Yes

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Hypo Allergenic?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• This cream does not contain fragrance or colorants. It provides long lasting moisturisation and leaves skin soft, smooth & youthful looking.
• Hydrates to soften and smooth skin.
• This cream provides moisture nourishment for up to 24 hours, improving skin smoothness and helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles to leave even dry skin youthful looking.
• Its formula:
• Contains a special moisture binding system that locks in moisture where it's needed most.
• Is designed to be light, non-greasy and quickly absorbed into skin.
• No added fragrance or colorants.
• Is Allergy and Dermatologist tested
• Is fragrance free

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.
Important information, do not discard outer package.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Mineral Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Cyclopentasiloxane, Stearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearic Acid, Methylparaben, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Imidazolidinyl Urea, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA

Directions

Smooth evenly onto cleansed face and neck twice a day.
